group_to_visualize.description: [string] The visibility group that will be set to visible.

group_to_hide.description: [string] The visibility group that will be set to hidden. When this is NOT set, ALL other visibility groups in the unit will be set to invisible.

impulse_multiplier.description: The multiplier to apply to the impulse in order to increase or decrease the magnitude of the impulse applied from whatever destroyed it.

torque_multiplier.description: The multiplier to apply to the torque in order to increase or decrease the magnitude of the torque applied from whatever destroyed it.
